20110117180448.000|20110117180450.000|TR0|

20110117180452.000|20110117180455.000|TR0|and describe exactly what we did and what 
20110117180455.000|20110117180457.000|TR0|we needed to do.  If you recall from the 
20110117180457.000|20110117180459.000|TR0|first conference where I mentioned the 
20110117180459.000|20110117180502.000|TR0|Congresswoman's initial injuries, I did 
20110117180502.000|20110117180504.000|TR0|mention she had bilateral orbital roof 
20110117180504.000|20110117180506.000|TR0|fractures.  That's, basically, fractures 
20110117180506.000|20110117180509.000|TR0|in the roof of the eye socket.
20110117180509.000|20110117180511.000|TR0|
20110117180511.000|20110117180513.000|TR0|Fortunately, on the left, that fracture 
20110117180513.000|20110117180516.000|TR0|does not look as though it will need any 
20110117180516.000|20110117180518.000|TR0|kind of repair.  On the right, however, 
20110117180518.000|20110117180520.000|TR0|the bone fragments from that fracture were 
20110117180520.000|20110117180523.000|TR0|pushing down enough on the eye and its  -- 
20110117180523.000|20110117180525.000|TR0| and the contents of the eye socket that 
20110117180525.000|20110117180527.000|TR0|Dr. Polanski, actually, that initial day, 
20110117180527.000|20110117180530.000|TR0|needed to perform a very quick releasing 
20110117180530.000|20110117180532.000|TR0|incision and operation.  But we did not 
20110117180532.000|20110117180534.000|TR0|want to do the full repair at that time.
20110117180534.000|20110117180537.000|TR0|
20110117180537.000|20110117180539.000|TR0|The patient, as you know, was very, very 
20110117180539.000|20110117180542.000|TR0|-- in very, very critical condition, at 
20110117180542.000|20110117180544.000|TR0|that time, and we did not want to take a 
20110117180544.000|20110117180546.000|TR0|chance to further exacerbate brain 
20110117180546.000|20110117180549.000|TR0|swelling and other factors that could have 
20110117180549.000|20110117180551.000|TR0|been adversely affecting her.
20110117180551.000|20110117180553.000|TR0|
20110117180553.000|20110117180556.000|TR0|So, we put that off until such at such a 
20110117180556.000|20110117180558.000|TR0|time we felt she was through that critical 
20110117180558.000|20110117180600.000|TR0|period, and at about the week mark is when 
20110117180600.000|20110117180603.000|TR0|we felt that would be right.  We did want 
20110117180603.000|20110117180605.000|TR0|to get to that fracture and repair it 
20110117180605.000|20110117180607.000|TR0|within a reasonable amount of time, within 
20110117180607.000|20110117180610.000|TR0|the first few weeks, to prevent 
20110117180610.000|20110117180612.000|TR0|complications down the road from the 
20110117180612.000|20110117180614.000|TR0|pressure on that eye socket.
20110117180614.000|20110117180617.000|TR0|
20110117180617.000|20110117180619.000|TR0|The procedure, itself, did require a 
20110117180619.000|20110117180621.000|TR0|craniotomy, that's opening a window in the 
20110117180621.000|20110117180624.000|TR0|skull.  It did require that we remove some 
20110117180624.000|20110117180626.000|TR0|of the rim of the eye socket so we could 
20110117180626.000|20110117180628.000|TR0|work in that space, remove the bone 
20110117180628.000|20110117180631.000|TR0|fragments, and take the pressure off.
20110117180631.000|20110117180633.000|TR0|
20110117180633.000|20110117180635.000|TR0|And then, again, working with Dr. 
20110117180635.000|20110117180638.000|TR0|Polanski, we, actually, reconstructed that 
20110117180638.000|20110117180640.000|TR0|rough with a metal mesh and, then, were 
20110117180640.000|20110117180642.000|TR0|able to close up.  We did do this all 
20110117180642.000|20110117180645.000|TR0|through an incision, just above the 
20110117180645.000|20110117180647.000|TR0|eyebrow, so we would not have to re-expose 
20110117180647.000|20110117180649.000|TR0|and risk the left side of the brain and we 
20110117180649.000|20110117180652.000|TR0|wanted to minimize that as much as 
20110117180652.000|20110117180654.000|TR0|possible.
20110117180654.000|20110117180656.000|TR0|
20110117180656.000|20110117180659.000|TR0|And I'm happy to say that within a few 
20110117180659.000|20110117180701.000|TR0|hours of the surgery, she was waking up 
20110117180701.000|20110117180704.000|TR0|and through the weekend she came back to 
20110117180704.000|20110117180706.000|TR0|the same baseline she had been before the 
20110117180706.000|20110117180708.000|TR0|surgery, that same level of interaction 
20110117180708.000|20110117180711.000|TR0|she's been having with us.  And that's all 
20110117180711.000|20110117180713.000|TR0|very good.
20110117180713.000|20110117180715.000|TR0|

20110117180727.000|20110117180729.000|TR0|DR. RANDY FREEZE, UNIVERSITY MEDICAL 
20110117180729.000|20110117180732.000|TR0|CENTER:  So, prior to Dr. Lemole's 
20110117180732.000|20110117180734.000|TR0|procedure, Dr. Rhee and myself performed a 
20110117180734.000|20110117180736.000|TR0|tracheotomy and gastrocemy (ph) on the 
20110117180736.000|20110117180739.000|TR0|Congresswoman.  These are very common 
20110117180739.000|20110117180741.000|TR0|procedures performed that are performed on 
20110117180741.000|20110117180743.000|TR0|brain injury patients that will allow us 
20110117180743.000|20110117180746.000|TR0|to expedite their care, provide them with 
20110117180746.000|20110117180748.000|TR0|adequate nutrition, manage their air in a 
20110117180748.000|20110117180750.000|TR0|much more comfortable manner.
20110117180750.000|20110117180753.000|TR0|
20110117180753.000|20110117180755.000|TR0|Therefore, the tubes that were in her face 
20110117180755.000|20110117180757.000|TR0|are no longer there and no longer needed.  
20110117180757.000|20110117180800.000|TR0|And it, also, decreases the risk of 
20110117180800.000|20110117180802.000|TR0|infection, sinusitis, aspiration, those 
20110117180802.000|20110117180804.000|TR0|types of things.  She tolerated those 
20110117180804.000|20110117180807.000|TR0|procedures well.  In fact, we did them

20110117182541.000|20110117182543.000|TR0|Take a look at what happens if we have a

20110117184120.000|20110117184123.000|TR0|closed roads.  You can see some pictures 
20110117184123.000|20110117184125.000|TR0|of it there.
20110117184125.000|20110117184127.000|TR0|
20110117184127.000|20110117184130.000|TR0|The alleged gunman in last weekend's 
20110117184130.000|20110117184132.000|TR0|attack in Tucson was an avid gamer.  We 
20110117184132.000|20110117184134.000|TR0|don't know exactly what Jared Lee 
20110117184134.000|20110117184137.000|TR0|Loughner's mental health condition is, but 
20110117184137.000|20110117184139.000|TR0|today there's new evidence today that 
20110117184139.000|20110117184141.000|TR0|video game addiction can increase mental 
20110117184141.000|20110117184144.000|TR0|health problems.
20110117184144.000|20110117184146.000|TR0|
20110117184146.000|20110117184149.000|TR0|Our senior medical correspondent Elizabeth 
20110117184149.000|20110117184151.000|TR0|Cohen joins me now with more on this.
20110117184151.000|20110117184153.000|TR0|
20110117184153.000|20110117184156.000|TR0|What's the link?
20110117184156.000|20110117184158.000|TR0|
20110117184158.000|20110117184200.000|TR0|ELIZABETH COHEN, CNN SENIOR MEDICAL 
20110117184200.000|20110117184203.000|TR0|CORRESPONDENT:  Well, the link is when 
20110117184203.000|20110117184205.000|TR0|kids do this excessively, and what some 
20110117184205.000|20110117184207.000|TR0|would call pathologically, it can lead to 
20110117184207.000|20110117184210.000|TR0|problems like depression and anxiety and 
20110117184210.000|20110117184212.000|TR0|poor school performance.  That's what they 
20110117184212.000|20110117184214.000|TR0|found.  They looked at 3,000 kids in 
20110117184214.000|20110117184217.000|TR0|Singapore, and 10 percent of them had what 
20110117184217.000|20110117184219.000|TR0|the authors called pathological gaming.  
20110117184219.000|20110117184221.000|TR0|And if you think, oh, well that's just in 
20110117184221.000|20110117184224.000|TR0|Singapore, there have been similar 
20110117184224.000|20110117184226.000|TR0|findings here.  And these kids, Ali, they 
20110117184226.000|20110117184228.000|TR0|were gaming like 30 hours a week.
20110117184228.000|20110117184231.000|TR0|
20110117184231.000|20110117184233.000|TR0|VELSHI:  All right.  I'm sure a lot of 
20110117184233.000|20110117184235.000|TR0|parents watching this will say my kid 
20110117184235.000|20110117184238.000|TR0|games too much.  What's too much?  How do 
20110117184238.000|20110117184240.000|TR0|you know?
20110117184240.000|20110117184242.000|TR0|

20110117184245.000|20110117184247.000|TR0|terms of time.
20110117184247.000|20110117184249.000|TR0|
